quest.name: Battle1
quest.short: SPACESHIP:10 minutes Fight a duel without changing player levels and parameters.
quest.long:
[Most kills wins] Use the walls to ambush your opponents.
Teams will be assigned automatically when 4 players join.

quest.name: Battle2
quest.short: PALACE:10 minutes All players' levels will revert to Level 1.
quest.long: [Most kills wins] Item boxes appear on the field. Be careful, if you are killed, you lose points.

quest.name: Battle3
quest.short: SPACESHIP:10 minutes Warp Battle All players' levels are equal, so use warps to win this battle.
quest.long: [WARP battle] Use the warps to get behind your rivals.

quest.name: Battle4
quest.short: PALACE:10 minutes Meseta Battle All levels are equal, so use the map to find Meseta.
quest.long: [Meseta Battle] Get the highest amount of Meseta to win. Kill other players before they get Meseta.

quest.name: Battle5
quest.short: PALACE:10 minutes Meseta battle There are no revivals and no level limits.
quest.long: [Meseta Battle] Bring plenty of health items and equip healing spells. Get the highest amount of Meseta to win. Notice : Mag is unusable. Teams will be assigned automatically when 4 players join.

quest.name: Battle6
quest.short: SPACESHIP:10 minutes Battle it out and shoot at each other from behind walls.
quest.long:
[Most kills wins] Use the walls to ambush your opponents.
Teams will be assigned automatically when 4 players join.

quest.name: Battle7
quest.short: SPACESHIP:10 minutes Obstacle Race
quest.long:
[Obstacle Race]
Avoid obstacles Get Meseta Avoid enemies 15 lives

quest.name: Battle8
quest.short: SPACESHIP:10 minutes Battle it out through trap hell.
quest.long:
[Trap Hell]
Watch out for random traps!

quest.name: q058
quest.short: Let's make a bouquet as a present for White Day!
quest.long: Ask Naula sisters where the flowers are blooming and make a bouquet for White Day!

quest.name: Sugoroku
quest.short: Hunters: Defeat all enemies!
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Defeat as many enemies as you can in the simulator within the time limit. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: AOL CUP -Maximum Attack-
quest.short: Hunters: Defeat all enemies!
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Defeat as many enemies as you can in the simulator within the time limit. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: AOL CUP -Sunset Base-
quest.short: Get to the bottom of this strange request!
quest.long:
Client: Rapeel Quest: A strange request has arrived via mail. It seems that somebody desperately needs help.
Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Maximum Attack 4th Stage -A-
quest.short: PSO BB 3rd Anniversary Memorial quest. Play three battlefields again Rescue the crisis of the lagoon!
quest.long: Client: joint measures headquarters Request: The mysterious photon concentration rose sharply. A large number of living things were found in lagools. I want you to take control of hunters. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Maximum Attack 4th Stage -B-
quest.short: PSO BB 3rd Anniversary Memorial quest. Play three battlefields again Rescue the crisis of the lagoon!
quest.long: Client: joint measures headquarters Request: The mysterious photon concentration rose sharply. A large number of living things were found in lagools. I want you to take control of hunters. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Maximum Attack 4th Stage -C-
quest.short: PSO BB 3rd Anniversary Memorial quest. Play three battlefields again Rescue the crisis of the lagoon!
quest.long: Client: joint measures headquarters Request: The mysterious photon concentration rose sharply. A large number of living things were found in lagools. I want you to take control of hunters. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Gift of Governor
quest.short: On the other hand The governor made up A new VR program. What's that?
quest.long: Chief: Governor General Request: It is called 'howaya.' A new VR program was produced. Enhance hunters' bonds I want you to experience it by all means. Reward: 300 minutes ※ this quest is for two players only.

quest.name: Dream Messenger
quest.short: Help a boy's mysterious dream come true.
quest.long: Client: A father Job description: My son insists on going down to Ragol, and won't take no for an answer. Go to Ragol and find out what my son is looking for. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Pioneer Halloween
quest.short: Find some legendary cake to hand out to the children!
quest.long: Client: Young woman Quest: I need you to get me the best cake in the universe! But the 3 Naura Sisters are somewhere on Gal Da Val Island! Reward: ???

quest.name: Maximum Attack 2
quest.short: Use teamwork to defeat the enemies.
quest.long: Client: Principal Job description: Work together with other hunters to obliterate the enemies to achieve your goal under a time limit. Reward: ???

quest.name: Beach Laughter (Ver ?)
quest.short: Bring life to the rappies!
quest.long:
Client: ???
Quest: Give life to the rappies!

quest.name: Singing by the Beach
quest.short: Party with the Rappies!
quest.long:
Client: ??? Job description: Rappies are throwing a party! Please come join us!
Reward: ???

quest.name: Festivity On The Beach
quest.long: The Lab is closed for the night...

quest.name: Beach Laughter
quest.short: Bring life to the Rappys!
quest.long:
Client: ???
Quest: Give life to the rappies!

quest.name: Pioneer Christmas
quest.short: Please deliver the cake wrapping paper to the cake shop.
quest.long: Client: Naura sisters Quest: I came to purchase cake wrapping paper for the Christmas cake, but I'm caught up in some busywork. Can you deliver it to my sisters? Reward: 500 Meseta

quest.name: Maximum Attack 4th Stage -A-
quest.short: PSO BB 3rd Anniversary Memorial quest. Play three battlefields again Rescue the crisis of the lagoon!
quest.long: Client: joint measures headquarters Request: The mysterious photon concentration rose sharply. A large number of living things were found in lagools. I want you to take control of hunters. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: MA4 Special Venue(40,000,000 kills)
quest.short: -MA4 Special Venue- Deep Into The Deep (40,000,000 kills) Lost in lagol I met the battle Hunters on Fate to wait for!
quest.long: Client: joint measures headquarters Request: Hunters in action Prepare supplies for you Yes. Please make use of it. 40,000,000 kills Congratulations!

quest.name: Mop-up Operation #1
quest.short: Mission: Sweep monsters from forest.
quest.long: Client: lieutenant Quest: I want the monsters in the forest around the Central Dome to be swept away. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Mop-up Operation #2
quest.short: Mission: Sweep monsters from caves.
quest.long: Client: lieutenant Quest: I want the monsters in the underground caves to be swept away. Reward: ??? Meseta *This quest requires at least 2 players.

quest.name: Mop-up Operation #3
quest.short: Mission: Sweep machines in the mines.
quest.long: Client: lieutenant Quest: I want the machines in the mines underground to be swept out. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Mop-up Operation #4
quest.short: Mission: Sweep monsters from the ruins.
quest.long: Client: lieutenant Quest: I want the monsters in the ruins underground to be swept out. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Endless Nightmare #1
quest.short: Exterminate all monsters in the forest on Ragol.
quest.long: Client: soldier Quest: Monsters seem to be constantly regenerating in one area of the forest. Exterminate them. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Endless Nightmare #2
quest.short: Mission: Exterminate all monsters in a cave on Ragol.
quest.long: Client: soldier Quest: Monsters seem to be constantly regenerating in one area of the caves. Exterminate them. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Endless Nightmare #3
quest.short: Exterminate all monsters in the mines on Ragol.
quest.long: Client: soldier Quest: Monsters seem to be constantly regenerating in one area of the mines. Exterminate them. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Endless Nightmare #4
quest.short: Exterminate all monsters in the ruins on Ragol.
quest.long: Client: soldier Quest: Monsters seem to be constantly regenerating in one area of the ruins. Exterminate them. Reward: ??? Meseta * This quest requires at least 2 players.

quest.name: Today's Rate
quest.short: Infiltrate the depths of the laboratory and delete the research data!
quest.long: Client: A spy who infiltrated the lab Quest: Prevent the disclosure of the research to the outside world! Destroy the host computer to prevent the disclosure! Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: 1-1:Planet Ragol
quest.short: Go down to Ragol's surface and report on the conditions there.
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: We need expert hunters like yourself to explore and gather data from Ragol's surface. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 1-2:Torrential Woods
quest.short: Eliminate the hostile animals prowling around the Central Dome area!
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Please eliminate the dangerous wildlife in the area around the Central Dome.

quest.name: 1-3:Subterranean Den
quest.short: Nobody has come back from beneath the Central Dome alive...
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Nobody that we've sent beneath the Central Dome has come back alive. Please go down and investigate. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 2-1:Infernal Cavern
quest.short: A cave has been found beneath Ragol. Go and investigate.
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: A network of subterranean caverns has been found under the surface of Ragol. Please investigate. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 2-2:Deep Within
quest.short: A bizarre monument, has been found within the caverns...
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Please get some data readings on the strange monument discovered in the caverns. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 2-3:The Mutation
quest.short: Gather data on the creatures that live underground.
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: We have no data on the creatures living in the caves. Please go and take some data readings on them.

quest.name: 2-4:Waterway Shadow
quest.short: Mysterious "thing" seen in the underground waterway.
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Make your way to the underground waterway in the caverns. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 3-1:The Facility
quest.short: Why is there a large-scale facility underneath Ragol?
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Please investigate the strange, large-scale facility that was discovered beneath Ragol's surface. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 3-2:Machines Attack
quest.short: Annihilate the machines that are down in the mines!
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Annihilate the machines that have begun attacking everything in the underground mine area.

quest.name: 3-3:Central Control
quest.short: Find the control room to the underground facility!
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: There must be some sort of central control room to the underground facility. Try to find it. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 4-1:The Lost Ruins
quest.short: Break the seal to the ruins and get inside!
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: We believe that we have found ruins under the surface of Ragol. The entrance is sealed, however. Please try to find a way inside in order to investigate.

quest.name: 4-2:Buried Relics
quest.short: Get data on the writing from the stone monument in the ruins!
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Please take some data of the writing on the stone relics in the ruins.

quest.name: 4-3:Hero and Daughter
quest.short: A secret request from the Principal. What could he want?
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Details pending. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 4-4:The Tomb Stirs
quest.short: Exterminate the enemies and secure a path through the ruins!
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Exterminate the strange life forms in the ruins, and secure a path to the bottom. ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: 4-5:Dark Inheritance
quest.short: Get to the bottom of the ruins! The answers must lie there!
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Whatever is down in those sealed ruins is what brings this all together... ※ Job can be joined while in progress.

quest.name: The Missing Maracas
quest.short: Get out there and find the missing maracas!
quest.long: Client: Memory Hunter Quest: Search for the missing maracas to regain lost memories. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Lost HEAT SWORD
quest.short: Retrieve a weapon from a Dragon!
quest.long: Client: Hopkins, hunter Quest: My weapon was taken from me when I was fighting a Dragon. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Lost ICE SPINNER
quest.short: Retrieve a weapon from a De Rol Le!!
quest.long: Client: Hopkins, hunter Quest: My weapon was taken from me when I was fighting a De Rol Le. Reward: ??? Meseta *This quest requires at least 2 players.

quest.name: Lost SOUL BLADE
quest.short: Retrieve a weapon from a Vol Opt!!!
quest.long: Client: Hopkins, hunter Quest: My weapon was taken from me when I was fighting a Vol Opt. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Fragments of a Memory
quest.short: The search for message capsules left in the Ruins.
quest.long: Client: Military Request: Pioneer 1 may have left message capsules in the Underground Ruins on Ragol. I want you to look for them. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Lost HELL PALLASCH
quest.short: Will this be the final request from Hopkins? Retrieve a weapon from an enemy!!!!
quest.long: Client: Hopkins, Force Request: My weapon was taken from me when I was fighting in the Ruins. I want to get it back! Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Rappy's Holiday
quest.short: Let's play with Rappy!
quest.long: The Rappies are having a festival. Participate and get excited.

quest.name: Gallon's Treachery
quest.short: "Shoot a movie on the surface of Ragol" What are Gallon's expectations?
quest.long: Client: Gallon Details: Partake in a movie! Apply now for lead roles! Active duty hunters welcome. Need 2 to 4 roles. Reward: ??? Meseta * This quest requires at least 2 players.

quest.name: Towards the Future
quest.short: Challenge the new simulator.
quest.long: Client: Principal Quest: Wishes to have hunters challenge the new simulator. Reward: ??? Meseta

quest.name: Labyrinthine Trial
quest.short: Build a strong bond with your teammates using the Principal's simulation!
quest.long: Client: Irene Job description: A combat simulation has been prepared to help you build your team skills. * This quest requires more than one player. Reward: 0 Meseta

quest.name: MAXIMUM ATTACK 1 Ver2
quest.short: Use teamwork to defeat the enemies.
quest.long: Client: Man in highfaluting clothes. Quest: All hunters must cooperate to keep destroying enemies in the simulator to save specific points.

quest.name: Famitsu Cup v2 (v1)
quest.short: Hunters ranking Challenge! Kyoso Corporation Enter brain Corporation E access
quest.long: Lord? Man in an agate clothes Request: We want to determine hunters' ranking, so please clear our issue.

quest.name: The Tinkerbell's Dog 2
quest.short: Find a pet that ran away!
quest.long: Client: Neighborhood child Quest: A pet that was kept in secret ran away. Owner wants it brought home. Reward: ??? Meseta.

quest.name: St. Valentine's Day
quest.short: Special Quest for a single player. Females only.
quest.long: Borrow utensils from patisserie sisters and let's make a handmade chocolate.

quest.name: Good Luck!
quest.short: Inside item pack Invitation...
quest.long: Client:? Request: Happy New Year! Are you a lucky Casino As an honorary visitor Hunters were chosen from inside! Chance once in this life Come and visit us!
